preqs: (CIV3221, CIV3222, CIV3247, CIV3248, CIV3264, CIV3283) or (CIV3248, CIV3221, CIV3285 or CIV3264, CIV3204, CIV3284, CIV3247) or (CIV3248, CIV3285 or CIV3264, ENE3048, ENE3606)

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {CIV3221, CIV3222} or  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {CIV3247, CIV3248} or  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CIV3264} or  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CIV3283})

(Any co-req (I/W) unit in {CIV3221, CIV3247, CIV3264, CIV3283} and Any co-req (I/W) unit in {CIV3222, CIV3248, CIV3264, CIV3283} and Any co-req (I/W) unit in {CIV3221, CIV3248, CIV3264, CIV3283} and Any co-req (I/W) unit in {CIV3222, CIV3247, CIV3264, CIV3283})

(Must have passed 6 units in {CIV3221, CIV3222, CIV3247, CIV3248, CIV3264, CIV3283} or  (Must have passed 5 units in {CIV3204, CIV3221, CIV3247, CIV3248, CIV3284} and  Must have passed 1 units in {CIV3264, CIV3285}) or  (Must have passed 3 units in {CIV3248, ENE3048, ENE3606} and  Must have passed 1 units in {CIV3264, CIV3285}))

description: This is a capstone unit drawing together the material taught in previous units. The objective is to utilise this knowledge to undertake a multi-disciplinary open ended design task for a specified civil engineering development, in groups, mirroring the expectations of working in professional practice. The design project will vary from year to year but will include aspects of structural, water, geomechanics, environmental engineering and transport design with an emphasis on sustainable design.
